name: Lost On The Ocean
description:
It is 11 PM. And your ship gets struck by a ice berg.

Controls

Click on things to interact with them

Credits

All the code was written by Found4k.

TIPS [SPOILERS]
  • Use windows to distract the officer
  • Break glass
  • Use shoes
Beta Disclaimer

To play the most recent beta version you must play it in your browser! If you download it you will get beta 1.0.0! Any beta versions will be in browser. Also this will go with the full game!
